meanings.definition: To make a mess by splashing or smearing something
meanings.sent1: The kids were splodging paint all over the paper.
meanings.sent2: She accidentally splodged ketchup on her shirt.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was splodging in the mud, wagging its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: The artist splodged colors together, creating a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The chef splodged sauce on the plate, adding a burst of flavor.
